channel.title: CVE Feed for Go standard library -- io/fs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Go standard library -- io/fs

item.title: CVE-2022-30630|2024-08-03T06:56:12.871Z -- go%20standard%20library -- io%2Ffs
item.description: Uncontrolled recursion in Glob in io/fs before Go 1.17.12 and Go 1.18.4 allows an attacker to cause a panic due to stack exhaustion via a path which contains a large number of path separators.
